page.title: 12KEMPSTON FAMILY ORIGINS - 1
page.content:
{A. CAMESTONE LOWER - urban Kempston {28%}of the pupils' parents were {born in Bedfordshire.}19% of the pupils' grandparents are from Bedfordshire, the remainder coming from other parts of Great Britain, Europe and Asia.
{B. KEMPSTON RURAL - country area There are 84 children aged 5-9 from 64 families in the school.{74}of these were{born in Bedfordshire.}Only 2 families, the Browns and the Harpers had 3 generations born locally. 20% of the parents and grandparents not born here came from London and quite a number came from Ireland, Wales, the North and Norfolk in search of work in the 1930s.
